title: Strengthening CS Competencies in Practice: Work-Integrated Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners complete at least 80% of microlearning modules (5–10 minutes) provided twice weekly in a blended learning environment
Learners can solve financial calculation problems presented in face-to-face workshops with 90% accuracy
Learners collaborate with peers on at least three mathematical modeling projects using online collaboration tools
Learners achieve an average score of 85 or higher in formative assessments at the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
